name: myTS
0:
”Alexa, turn on Living room lamp”
”Alexa, turn off boiler”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Firstly, need to download the myTS app and register an account

After linking the myTS account to Alexa account, and find the socket
"Alexa, turn on/off XXX". The myTS socket will turn on/off

after adding several sockets into one group,
"Alexa, turn on/off XXX". The group sockets will all turn on/off
